value.title: StarCraft 2: VOID RAY & LURKER NERFS - The OFFICIAL Balance Patch!
value.excerpt: New balance changes were just announced for StarCraft 2. These are my very first impressions of the patch. This patch includes changes to the Shield Battery, Dark Templar, Void Ray, Queen, Widow Mine, Lurker and Nydus Worm.  Link to the patch notes: https://news.blizzard.com/en-us/starcraft2/23774006/starctaft-ii-5-0-9-ptr-patch-notes
